article_title: 6 tips for getting ready for ICD-10
article_text:
Barring Congressional interference (again), ICD-10 coding will become the norm on Oct. 1, which means health systems and physician practices need to get prepared or face the reimbursement losses that could follow. Bonnie Cassidy, senior director of health information management innovation for Nuance, has shared the following tips for getting prepared for the roll-out. Take a look and let us know if there are any that she left off.

Advance slide to start gallery.

og.description: While some are holding out for a delay, the risks could be costly for organizations that aren't prepared.
